docs.text: Welcome to Multi-language New for Kids  This project can take news from other website and then to translate into every language in the world. It will use a speech to tell you the news in every language.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Create a new repository  echo "# wn4k" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git branch -M main git remote add origin https://github.com/EZhu2012/wn4k.git git push -u origin main Check in the changes  git add <filename> git commit -m "<description>" git push

docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs  For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands  mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout  mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Mkdocs
